front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Process Industry - International Energy Efficient Class 3 (IE3) (Premium-Efficiency), Severe-Duty, Totally Enclosed Frame Surface Cooled Squirrel Cage Induction Motors - 0.75 kW to 370 kW (1 hp to 500 hp)
front.abstract: This standard applies to IE3 IP56, horizontal and vertical, single-speed, squirrel cage polyphase induction motors, up to and including 370 kW, for petroleum, chemical, and other severe-duty applications (commonly referred to as IE3 severe-duty motors). Excluded from the scope of this standard are motors with sleeve bearings and additional specific features required for Ex "d" motors.
